title: Land
details:
Price is negotiable with clear document . Reson for sale ( moving to another house) 5 minuets to dargatown . 15 minute to Aluthgama city. Rectangular shaped 20 perch flat land facing Aluthgama Mathugama main road just after the Abagaha junction.
04 Coconut Trees and close proximity to Velipenna Highway Entrance.
